inclusion.criterion: Critically ill patients admitted to intensive care units in Stockholm
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with DNAR (do not attempt resuscitation)-orders
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients dying within 12 hours of commencing renal replacement therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 55yo woman with h/o ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis who presented with watery, non bloody diarrhea and weakness.
